Reviews
Stop reviews carousel Play reviews carousel 
Review by - Yelp

Charlene F:
five star review by 
The restaurant has a comfortable feel and it faces the water. The water is a beautiful view. The waitress was great and knowledgeable of the menu. The pork dish featured tender and flavorful pork, paired harmoniously with creamy mashed potatoes and vibrant broccolini...

Review by - Yelp

Lynne H:
five star review by 
Beautiful location, great service and fabulous menu. Had lunch with a large party on a Saturday afternoon. Lots of reasonably priced lunch choices and fun specialty cocktails. Outside bar on lower level was fun too. Can't wait to visit again.

Review by - Yelp

Sydney B:
five star review by 
Monday Madness was made that much easier by the amazing Baked Crab and Spinach Dip, calamari and strong margaritas at Water Edge. Did I mention the great views of the water? Bergerknowsbest will be returning for another post work day...

Review by - Yelp

Cynthia R:
five star review by 
I have never had a whole fried dish before but decided to venture out my norm. So glad I did, this fried whole flounder dish did not disappoint. So flavorful, so most, just ridiculously good. The service was excellent too, as well as the decor...

Review by - Yelp

LaVonne L:
five star review by 
Fantastic place! Sat on the water watching the boats and tiki boats go by while enjoying a Crab Cake Eggs Benedict! One of the best I've ever had with the Chef's handmade lime Hollinday sauce wowza! The chef himself brought me the plate and explained the sauce and the benedict...
